thread.title: Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice - will the judges turn for her?
thread.title_full: Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice - will the judges turn for her? - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice - will the judges turn for her?
text:
Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice - will the judges turn for her? Abi will be performing six years after she released her debut single Share Comments By Roz Laws 02:30, 18 FEB 2017 TV Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next This Morning viewers call for Ruth and Eamon to b Watch this video again Watch Next Coleen Nolan sees her sister Linda Nolan's faceli 0:44 Bianca Gascoigne tearful about Jamie O'Hara on Lo 0:30 Candice Brown addresses Prue Leith replacing Mary 0:30 This Morning viewers confused as Charlie Hunnam a 0:34 Alison Hammond announces she's doing Let's Sing a 0:40 John Partridge says Danny Dyer is under "enormous 0:46 Piers Morgan and Boy George joke about being 'ico 0:21 The legend behind Dot Cotton - June Brown at 90 2:09 Steve Irwin's son is following in his father's fo 0:35 Ricky Martin explains how he met his husband on I 0:29 Katie Price claims Happy Xmas sign is up because 0:27 Series of huge explosions in Vaucluse in France 0:29 Jose Mourinho speaks ahead of FA cup clash with B 4:52 Lisa Marie Presley and Michael Lockwood 0:42 Winning lottery number for Friday February 21 2:00 Google project to beam internet to Earth from gia 2:49 Video will play in Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips The Voice audition Share this video Watch Next Share Comments Get soaps Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips will be auditioning for The Voice tonight.
Abi played Liberty Savage in Hollyoaks and released her first single, Summer Sunshine, in 2011.
Now the 23-year-old from Sutton Coldfield, Birmingham, is bidding for a record contract by appearing on the talent show.
Abi will be performing Girl Crush by Little Big Town, and plays her guitar as well as sings, reports the Birmingham Mail.
Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice (Photo: ITV/The Voice) Abi will be performing Girl Crush by Little Big Town (Photo: ITV/The Voice) She appears on the ITV talent show in the last of the Blind Auditions, as one of the final few trying to impress coaches Will.i.am, Sir Tom Jones, Jennifer Hudson and Gavin Rossdale, who have their backs to the contestants.
Abi, who has been singing she was 12, was a member of the Birmingham pub band Shampoo, fronted by her hairdresser dad Richard and mum Linda.
Read More The Voice's Bo Bruce gives birth to her first child three weeks early Former Hollyoaks actress Abi Phillips auditions for The Voice (Photo: ITV/The Voice) Abi Phillips from Hollyoaks (Photo: Birmingham Post and Mail) She got her big break after writing a song for Hollyoaks called Missing You, which featured in Steph Cunninghamâ€™s emotional death from cervical cancer.
Following the strong response from viewers to the track, Hollyoaks producers invited Abi to audition for Liberty, who she first played in December 2010 aged 16.
She showed off her voice when Liberty took part in a karaoke competition, and performed her debut single Summer Sunshine at T4 on the Beach 2011 which was filmed for Hollyoaks.
